about.name: The following questions are from real DMV written tests. These are some of the actual permit questions you will face in California. Each permit practice test question has three answer choices. Select one answer for each question and select "grade this section." You can find this button at the bottom of the drivers license quiz.  For a complete list of questions and answers for California please visit https://cheat-sheets.dmv-written-test.com/en/california/car.

hasPart.name: This sign means:
hasPart.assesses: This sign means: | This sign means: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: This sign indicates that a divided highway begins ahead. Keep to the right of the median divider.

suggestedAnswer.text: You are approaching the end of a divided highway.

comment.text: You are approaching the end of a divided highway.

suggestedAnswer.text: You are approaching the beginning of a divided highway.

comment.text: You are approaching the beginning of a divided highway.

suggestedAnswer.text: The road will be slippery ahead.

comment.text: The road will be slippery ahead.

acceptedAnswer.text: You are approaching the beginning of a divided highway.

comment.text: You are approaching the beginning of a divided highway.

answerExplanation.text: This sign indicates that a divided highway begins ahead. Keep to the right of the median divider.

comment.text: This sign means: | This sign indicates that a divided highway begins ahead. Keep to the right of the median divider.

hasPart.name: When approaching an intersection that is controlled by a flashing red traffic signal, you must:

about.name: When approaching an intersection that is controlled by a flashing red traffic signal, you must:

hasPart.assesses: When approaching an intersection that is controlled by a flashing red traffic signal, you must: | When approaching an intersection that is controlled by a flashing red traffic signal, you must: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: Treat a flashing red traffic signal the same as you would treat a stop sign. Come to a complete stop, yield to oncoming traffic or pedestrians, and proceed when the way is clear.

suggestedAnswer.text: Come to a complete stop, yield to oncoming traffic or pedestrians, then proceed.

comment.text: Come to a complete stop, yield to oncoming traffic or pedestrians, then proceed.

suggestedAnswer.text: Reduce your speed and proceed with caution.

comment.text: Reduce your speed and proceed with caution.

suggestedAnswer.text: Come to a complete stop and remain stopped as long as the light is red.

comment.text: Come to a complete stop and remain stopped as long as the light is red.

acceptedAnswer.text: Come to a complete stop, yield to oncoming traffic or pedestrians, then proceed.

comment.text: Come to a complete stop, yield to oncoming traffic or pedestrians, then proceed.

answerExplanation.text: Treat a flashing red traffic signal the same as you would treat a stop sign. Come to a complete stop, yield to oncoming traffic or pedestrians, and proceed when the way is clear.

comment.text: When approaching an intersection that is controlled by a flashing red traffic signal, you must: | Treat a flashing red traffic signal the same as you would treat a stop sign. Come to a complete stop, yield to oncoming traffic or pedestrians, and proceed when the way is clear.

hasPart.name: You may legally block an intersection:

about.name: You may legally block an intersection:

hasPart.assesses: You may legally block an intersection: | You may legally block an intersection: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: Even if the light is green, you may not enter an intersection unless you can get completely across before the light turns red. If you block the intersection, you can be cited.

suggestedAnswer.text: If you entered the intersection on the green light.

comment.text: If you entered the intersection on the green light.
During rush hour traffic.
Under no circumstances.
Under no circumstances.

answerExplanation.text: Even if the light is green, you may not enter an intersection unless you can get completely across before the light turns red. If you block the intersection, you can be cited.

comment.text: You may legally block an intersection: | Even if the light is green, you may not enter an intersection unless you can get completely across before the light turns red. If you block the intersection, you can be cited.

hasPart.name: At dawn or dusk and in rain or snow, it can be hard to see and be seen. A good way to let other drivers know you are there is to turn:

about.name: At dawn or dusk and in rain or snow, it can be hard to see and be seen. A good way to let other drivers know you are there is to turn:

hasPart.assesses: At dawn or dusk and in rain or snow, it can be hard to see and be seen. A good way to let other drivers know you are there is to turn: | At dawn or dusk and in rain or snow, it can be hard to see and be seen. A good way to let other drivers know you are there is to turn: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: You must use your headlights at any time when conditions prevent you from seeing other vehicles and when it may be difficult for other drivers to see you. Always use your low beam headlights if weather conditions require you to use your windshield wipers.

comment.text: Up the instrumental panel lights.
On your parking lights.
On your headlights.
On your headlights.

answerExplanation.text: You must use your headlights at any time when conditions prevent you from seeing other vehicles and when it may be difficult for other drivers to see you. Always use your low beam headlights if weather conditions require you to use your windshield wipers.

comment.text: At dawn or dusk and in rain or snow, it can be hard to see and be seen. A good way to let other drivers know you are there is to turn: | You must use your headlights at any time when conditions prevent you from seeing other vehicles and when it may be difficult for other drivers to see you. Always use your low beam headlights if weather conditions require you to use your windshield wipers.

hasPart.assesses: You must notify the DMV within five days if you: | You must notify the DMV within five days if you: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: If you sell or transfer a vehicle, you must report the sale or transfer to the DMV within five days.

comment.text: Sell or transfer your vehicle.
Fail a smog test.

suggestedAnswer.text: Get a new prescription for lenses or contacts.

comment.text: Get a new prescription for lenses or contacts.
Sell or transfer your vehicle.

hasPart.name: Check your rearview mirrors:
hasPart.assesses: Check your rearview mirrors: | Check your rearview mirrors: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: When driving, do not develop a fixed stare. Frequently check your rearview mirrors so you know the positions of vehicles near you.

suggestedAnswer.text: Often to see how traffic is moving behind you.

comment.text: Often to see how traffic is moving behind you.

suggestedAnswer.text: To see if a vehicle is in your blind spot.

comment.text: To see if a vehicle is in your blind spot.

suggestedAnswer.text: Only when you are slowing down.

comment.text: Only when you are slowing down.

acceptedAnswer.text: Often to see how traffic is moving behind you.

comment.text: Often to see how traffic is moving behind you.

answerExplanation.text: When driving, do not develop a fixed stare. Frequently check your rearview mirrors so you know the positions of vehicles near you.

comment.text: Check your rearview mirrors: | When driving, do not develop a fixed stare. Frequently check your rearview mirrors so you know the positions of vehicles near you.
